General.Name: Permaju Industries Bhd
General.Description: Permaju Industries Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the marketing and distribution of Ford motor vehicles in Malaysia. It operates through Timber, Automotive, and Property segments. The Timber segment sells timber logs and related timber products; and holds timber concessions and tree plantations. The Automotive segment sells and distributes motor vehicles; and offers repair and maintenance services. The Property segment develops and constructs properties. It also offers management services; and auto detailing and related services, as well as rental and leasing of motor vehicles. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
